description:
Hawaiian Tropic Silk Hydration Spray SPF50 offers 12hours moisturisation and is fast absorbing that pampers your skin while providing broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection Leaving your skin with a non greasy silky skin feel

Hawaiian Tropic Silk Hydration Spray SPF50 offers 12hours moisturisation and is fast absorbing that pampers your skin while providing broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection Leaving your skin with a non greasy silky skin feel

12H Moisturisation

4HR Water Resistant Reapply every 2 hours

Nongreasy

Fast absorbing

Reef Friendly No Oxybenzone or Octinoxate

PETA Cruelty Free

Made in Australia
name: Hawaiian Tropic Tropic Silk Hydration Sunscreen Spray Spf 50 175G
